fields.name: featuredStudy
fields.label: Featured Case Study (Hero)
fields.description: Select the study to show at the top with the big card.

fields.name: studyList
fields.label: Grid Sequence
fields.description: Drag and drop to reorder the list below.

fields.name: clientBrands
fields.label: Client Brands (Marquee)
fields.description: Logos displayed in the scrolling marquee across the site.

fields.name: name
fields.label: Brand Name
fields.description: Used for alt text and CMS organization.

fields.name: logo
fields.label: Brand Logo
fields.description: Upload a high-quality logo (transparent PNG/SVG recommended).

fields.name: gallery
fields.label: Masonry Gallery
fields.description: Images displayed in the masonry grid layout.

fields.name: featuredPost
fields.label: Featured Blog Post
fields.description: Select the post to highlight at the top of the blog page.

fields.name: postList
fields.label: Standard Blog Posts
fields.description: Add and drag to reorder the standard blog posts in the grid.

fields.name: key
fields.label: Feature Key
fields.description: Must match the Key in Global Table (e.g. 'sku_count')

fields.name: responseTime
fields.label: Response Time Text
fields.description: e.g. 'Usually within 24 hours on business days.'

fields.name: targetRevenue
fields.label: Target Revenue / Value
fields.description: The number the chart will count up to (e.g., 2000000)

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
